description:
Perhaps it`s because of the rain, but the Odd Jobs haven’t been receiving jobs for several days. And they grow more and more irritated by the humid climate. Shinpachi tries to liven things up by inviting Gintoki and Kagura to stroll around Edo in the rain. But when they pass by three girls with flower-print umbrellas, Kagura’s mood worsens. She closes her plastic umbrella and walks off getting soaked by the rain…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Definitely Do Not Let Your Girlfriend See the Things You Use for Crossdressing / There`s Almost a 100% Chance of Forgetting One`s Vinyl Umbrella and Then Hating Oneself
NH Butsu wa Kanojo ni Mitsukaru na / Hobo 100% no Kakuritsu de Vinyl Kasa o Okiwasurete Kuru Jibun ga Kirai
NH物は彼女に見つかるな / ほぼ100%の確率でビニール傘を置き忘れてくる自分が嫌い
